obfusticateAndCopyFiles

public SecurityTo obfusticateAndCopyFiles(java.util.Properties properties,
                                          java.lang.String vPath,
                                          java.util.Locale locale,
                                          java.lang.String appName,
                                          java.lang.String hostName,
                                          java.lang.String newStartingPoint,
                                          java.util.List<java.lang.String> fileList)
                                   throws com.interwoven.cssdk.access.CSAuthenticationException,
                                          com.interwoven.cssdk.common.CSRemoteException,
                                          com.interwoven.cssdk.common.CSException,
                                          java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                                          java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
Method to create an obfusticated copy of a file within Teamsite. Given a vPath

Parameters:
properties - Properties to attach to the Application
locale - The Locale
appName - The name of the Application
hostName - The hostname
vPath - The Starting vPath of the List of files to copy
fileList - A List of file names relative to the vPath
Returns:
Instance of SecuirtyTo which contains a Map of files copied successfully and a List of files which didn't copy
Throws:
com.interwoven.cssdk.access.CSAuthenticationException
com.interwoven.cssdk.common.CSRemoteException
com.interwoven.cssdk.common.CSException
java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
